comment: This is Nicoles husband James,THIS is a great app,I found a Trojan installed inside Google Play Newstand apk with this app(Yes sadly on June 10th 2015) and reported it to Google,they sent an update out shortly afterward but im begining to suspect they only did the update to remove it for the newer versions of Android that are automatically encrypted. If true it will be a sad day for Google. But bravo to Guardian Project on this wonderful app. Suggestion to include more files of the apks in the system? Would be great if everything was in there.
Great app one can use secure apps only

title: s as in suggestion or security
comment: checkey does the job but the one should use tools like this BEFORE installation of any apk and not after otherwise it's just a toy.

This app is not intended as a malware scanner, there are many including Google's own in Play, Lookout, Bluebox, etc.  This app is for auditing devices, finding out information about the installed apps, and also generating "pins" for trusted apps.  Then you can make your app only share to trusted apps using our TrustedIntents library.

title: Text display bug renders this useless
comment: Text overruns the display area with no ability to pan left-right to read the full info.   What good is the app if the full addresses, serial numbers and info cannot be read?  App seems to do an adequate job of finding all the data, just falls one critical step short of being usefull. Such a simple coding error guys.... fix it and five stars is yours.                        P.S. my OS=KITKAT running on an LG L90
Yeah, it is not ideal.  For now, you can see the whole thing by rotating the device to landscape view.

title: Thank you guardian project
comment: Another great product that works as advertised.

title: Cool...!
comment: Great app. If you know how to use it correctly with Tor.😎

title: Another gem from The Guardian Project!
comment: Your team is the best! I am eternally grateful for all the work you guys put in for the benefit of humanity. Altruism at its best. Thank you .
